description: The SFG Intelligent Text Corrector is an enterprise-grade Chrome extension and web application that provides AI-powered text correction, grammar checking, and prompt enhancement capabilities. Designed for professionals who demand accuracy and efficiency, it seamlessly integrates into daily workflows through browser right-click context menus and a comprehensive web dashboard. The platform leverages advanced language models to deliver real-time corrections, style improvements, and intelligent prompt optimization for business communications, technical documentation, and creative content creation.
capabilities: Real-time grammar and spelling correction with contextual suggestions
AI-powered prompt enhancement and optimization for better LLM interactions
Multiple writing style transformations (Simple, Business, Technical)
Punctuation checking and automated formatting improvements
Chrome extension with right-click context menu integration
Web-based dashboard for correction history and analytics
User authentication and personalized correction preferences
Business template library for standardized communications
Batch processing capabilities for large document corrections

workflows.name: Text Correction Workflow
workflows.description: User selects text in browser, chooses correction mode from context menu, receives AI-corrected text
steps: User highlights text in any web form or input field
Right-click opens SFG AI Tools context menu
Select correction mode (Grammar, Punctuation, Simple Rewrite, Business Style, Technical Style)
Extension sends text to API with selected mode
AI processes text and returns corrections
Corrected text replaces original selection automatically

workflows.name: Prompt Enhancement Workflow
workflows.description: User enhances AI prompts for better LLM responses using dedicated enhancement mode
steps: User writes initial prompt in any text field
Right-click and select 'AI Prompt Enhance' from SFG AI Tools menu
Extension analyzes prompt structure and intent
AI generates enhanced version with better clarity and specificity
User reviews enhanced prompt and can accept or modify
Enhanced prompt replaces original for immediate use

workflows.name: Business Template Application
workflows.description: User applies pre-configured business communication templates for standardized messaging
steps: User right-clicks in editable field
Selects 'Business Templates' from context menu
Browse available templates (emails, reports, proposals)
Select template matching communication need
Template populates field with customizable placeholders
User fills in specific details to complete document

workflows.name: Correction History Management
workflows.description: System tracks and displays user correction history for learning and reference
steps: Every correction is automatically saved with timestamp
User accesses web dashboard to view correction history
Filter history by date range, correction type, or text content
Review original text, corrected version, and correction mode used
Export history data for analysis or reporting
System provides insights on common errors and improvement trends
